scripts.generate-supabase-typechain: typechain --target ethers-v6 --out-dir supabase/functions/typechain abi/*.json && find supabase/functions/typechain -type f -name "*.ts" -exec sed -i 's|"./factories"|"./factories/index.ts"|g' {} + && find supabase/functions/typechain -type f -name \*.ts -exec sed -i 's|"ethers"|"https://esm.sh/ethers@6"|g' {} + && find supabase/functions/typechain -type f -name "*.ts" -exec sed -i -E '/from\s+"(\.\/|\.+\/)/ { /ts";$/! { /factories"$/ { s/(from\s+"((\.\/|\.+\/)[^"]+))"/\1\/index.ts"/g; }; /factories"$/! { s/(from\s+"((\.\/|\.+\/)[^"]+))"/\1.ts"/g; }; }; }' {} \;
